course.subject: FINA
course.name: Asia's Stock Markets
course.description: This course is highly relevant to students interested to become macro-traders, portfolio managers, buy/sell-side analysts or work at a hedge fund, with a particular focus on Asia. The course will teach students the characteristics of the larger, liquid stock markets across Asia, from China and Hong Kong to Korea, Taiwan, India and ASEAN markets. Students will learn what drives these markets, what they have in common and how they behave.
